mapper.insert: INSERT INTO analyzer_result (url, city, position, city_code, position_code, degree, boss_address, salary, experience, company_benefits, job_keywords, job_requirements, company_intro, company_name, company_size, company_type, establish_date, financing_stage, operation_status, legal_company_name) VALUES (#{url}, #{city}, #{position}, #{cityCode}, #{positionCode}, #{degree}, #{bossAddress}, #{salary, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{experience, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{companyBenefits, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{jobKeywords, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{jobRequirements}, #{companyIntro}, #{companyName}, #{companySize}, #{companyType}, #{establishDate}, #{financingStage}, #{operationStatus}, #{legalCompanyName})
